content.prompt: A team of sports psychologists is investigating the effects of different reinforcement schedules on athletes' performance and motivation. They plan to recruit high school athletes from various teams to participate in the study. Which ethical consideration should researchers prioritize when recruiting high school athletes for their research?

choices.label: Deceive participants about the study's true purpose in order to reduce response bias
Obtain informed assent from the athletes and informed consent from their parents
Offer financial incentives to encourage participation among high-school athletes
Restrict the study to only athletes already familiar with reinforcement schedules

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
